Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ] Application Guide Application Guide [PDF ]

Price: $17.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:56:30 UTC – Details)


Quick, Convenient and Hands-Free; the MagicMount is a powerful car phone mount magnetic system for conveniently mounting your smartphone, cell phone or larger smart devices to the dashboard in your vehicle, office, workshop, boat or RV. Lock your cell phone or device in place with this Scosche dash mount car holder featuring a 4-Axis adjustable ball joint neck with lock for optimal viewing at any angle. The integrated cable clips let you neatly connect your cables to the back of the magnetic phone car mount to keep cables from obstructing your view. Its cradle-free design eliminates the need to tighten around your device, just hover your phone magnet near the phone magnetic mount surface and it instantly locks securely in place. These powerful N50 neodymium magnets are very strong magnetic car phone mounts and are still 100% safe for modern smartphones and devices. The low-profile mount safely attaches to your dashboard using the automotive grade base to ensure optimal holding power. Compliment your cell phone automobile accessories with this car phone holder.
Magnetic Phone Holder – Comes with powerful Rare-Earth neodymium phone magnets that provide a secure grip to your iPhone, Android or Tablet. 100% mobile device safe. Simply stick the car mount magnet to the back of your phone case for a secure magnet hold.
Optimal Viewing – With 4-axis, 360-degree adjustable head and enhanced soft touch rubber lock-nut, this magnetic car mount allows viewing from any angle. Provides a great hands free experience.
Convenient Design – Integrated cable clip secures the charging cable to our car cell phone holder for a clean mount. The cradle-free design permits safe, easy one-handed use and access to all controls and ports.
Dashboard Accessories Included – phone mount, MagicPlates, protective film and user manual
Buy with Confidence – Backed by Scosche’s Lifetime Tech Support and 3-year Warranty

Secure this mount onto any firm, flat and clean surface area

Does not interfere with wireless charging when using the proper MagicPlate placement

The heat resistant automotive grade mounting base will safely secure a Smartphone in your car, home or office

Read more

Warranty & Support

Price: $179.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:54:39 UTC – Details)

From the brand

AOOG has always insisted on providing cost-effective car seat covers. Not only does it provide superior protection and meets versatile needs, it also adds comfort to your drive.Amazing details, clever design. Each AOOG seat cover has its own set of interior styles, details and premium materials. Discover the saddle that fits your vehicle.

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

F150 Leather Seat Covers

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: High-Grade Leatherette materials Protect the original car seat from damage, Durable Wear-Resistant Waterproof Easy to Clean. Equipped with thick, premium High-Density Foam to create top resilience for maximum comfort during your drive.
PROTECTS & LUXURIOUS: These are the perfect seat covers for your car. Our seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle. High-quality artificial leather and excellent appearance design, also refreshing the look of your interior.
STYLE DESIGN: Our universal fit seat covers with a unique visual design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags. The anchor attached to the elastic strap can also provide firm reinforcement.
EASY TO INSTALL: For your convenience, installation instructions are included in the product package, and we also provide product installation videos. Just follow the installation instructions, it usually takes 10-20 minutes to complete the installation.
UNIVERSAL FIT: Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles, including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. If you are not sure whether the vehicle is suitable for you, please contact us in time. Our customer service team will always online to assist you.

Read more

Details:
  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Lined with high-density foam for maximum comfort.
  • Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior.
  • Sideless design compatible with side armrests and airbags.
  • Easy to Install within minutes.

AOOG Leather Car Seat Covers Set – Waterproof Universal Car Seat Protector

AOOG Car Seat Covers can protect the original seat, give your car seat a new look.

These are the perfect seat covers, the best investment for your new vehicle, We design our products to ensure comfort is our top priority.

  • High-quality leatherette to provide valuable protection and luxurious comfort for almost any car or truck.
  • The entire seat, backrest and headrest are lined with high-density foam to provide maximum comfort during long-distance travel and daily commuting.
  • What’s In The Package?
  • 2 pcs Front Seat Covers + 2 pcs Front Headrest Covers.
  • Adjustable Back Seat Covers (for full set only).
  • A Hardware Bag of Steel Hooks and Round Plates for Install.
  • An Installation Manual.

Read more

Airbag Compatible

The airbag has enough room to stretch and will never be blocked. The front seat back has pockets for the things you want to put.

High-Quality Material

AOOG Seat Covers are made of multiple layers of high-quality materials to provide maximum comfort during your driving.

Breathable Holes

The main part of AOOG Seat Covers has Breathable Holes to ensure breathability during use and increase your comfortable experience

Five Colors

We provide a variety of colors for your choice

Read more

AOOG faux leather car seat cover are fit for most sedan, truck and suv

  • Fit Acura: Integra/Audi: A3 A4 A5 A6, A7, A8, Q5, Q7
  • Fit BMW: Series 1, Series 2, Series 3, Series 4, Series 5, Series 6, Series 7, Series 8, Mini Cooper, X1, X3, X4, X5, X6/Buick: Electra, Regal, Encore, LaCrosse, Enclave, Envision
  • Fit Chevrolet: SSR/Chevrolet: SSR, Cavalier, Malibu, Equinox, Traverse, Caprice, Impala/Cadillac: CTS, SRX/Chrysler : 300, Town & Country
  • Fit Dodge: Charger, Durango, Journey/Ford: Fiesta, Focus, Escape, Fusion, Mustang, Edge, Explorer
  • Fit Honda: City, Civic, CR-V, Pilot/Hummer：H2, H3/Hyundai: Elantra
  • Fit Jeep: Cherokee, Compass, Grand Cherokee, Grand Wagoneer/Kia: Sportage
  • Fit Land Rover: Range Rover Evoque, Range Rover/Lincoln: MKC, MKX, Continental, Navigator
  • Fit Mazda: 3/Mercedes-Benz: A Class, B Class, C Class, G Class, GLC, GLE, E Class, S Class
  • Fit Nissan: Sentra, X-Trail, Altima, Maxima, Frontier, Pathfinder
  • Fit Porsche: Macan/Toyota: Corolla, RAV4, Camry, Highlander, 4Runner, Land Cruiser/Volkswagen: Golf, Tiguan, Passat, CC, Touareg

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Price: $159.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:35:57 UTC – Details)

Product Description

【Seasons Apply】This car seat cover can be suitable for every season. The outside of the material is faux leather which can be used all year round. So there is no need to buy one in summer and buy another one in winter.
【Compatibility】 It is universal fit for most of cars, SUVs and trucks. Meanwhile it has a wonderful envelopment with the car seats which can maximize the protection to the seats. We leak out the air bags, so once an accident occurs, the air bags still work.
【Clean and Durability】 This car seat cover is quite easy to clean up when your kids or pets smudge it. It is waterproof so you can use the wet towel directly on it. And when it comes to the routine care, you can treat it the same way to your leather bag. The faux leather we used is not easy to be damaged or broken by your keys, pet’s paws or some other sharp metal. And it is also not easy to be burned up as we use a kind of material which contains fire retardant inside the seat cover.
【Installation】 The installation of this seat cover is not complex. You can install it by yourself through the installation video step by step and can also read the installation instruction inside the package. Don’t forget to communicate with us by emails if you are still frustrated with the installation and we will try our best to help you.
【Post-sale service】 It has 30 days return-protection guarantee and the delivery is through the FBA. We have a problem solving team stand by and if you have any questions you can find us by emails quickly and we will try our best to help you. So just have a try and we are sure you will be satisfied with our products.


Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:23 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Moongo Tool UNIVERSAL SOCKET is a must have tool for both the professional and the average person. It instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, hooks, eye and lag screws, bolt heads, and other various shape and size objects. Perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, auto repair, and other household maintenance. A great gift idea for dad, mom, father, mother, friends and family.

mens christmas gifts

You won’t know they needed a MoongoTool Universal Socket until they have one!

Built for Durability

We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly.

Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!

One Size Fits Most

The MoongoTool Universal Socket fits both standard 1/4 to 3/4 inch and metric 7 to 9 mm nuts and bolts.

It can also grasp hex nuts, square nuts, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads!

You Got The Power

The 3/8″ adapter included turns any power drill instantly into a power socket driver.

Loosen and tighten fasteners in seconds and get the job done even faster!

christmas gifts for men

Save Time And Money

Our innovative tool allows for going from fastener to another seamlessly.

No more stopping, searching, and switching for the correct socket.

The Perfect Gift for any Occasion!

The must have gift for the Father, Husband, Handyman, Guys, Boyfriend, Him, Do-It-Yourselfer, Boyfriend, Man or Woman.

This makes the perfect gift for the not-so-handy.

Suitable for DIY

Professional self adjusting universal repair tools.Can be used in household maintenance, and construction

Trying to find a gift for someone that has every tool? Chances are they don’t have this!

UNIVERSAL SOCKET WRENCH can be adjusted to unscrew most metric, wing nuts, broken nuts, stripped nuts, eye bolts, square nuts, hexes, etc.unique design of the Hexagon and Spring Pins can be closely engaged with the parts, not easy to slip. Perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, automotive repair, and other household maintenance.
TOOS FOR MEN: Self-adjustable from standard 1/4in to 3/4in and metric 7mm to 19mm with over 130lbs of torque. Adapter turns your drill into a socket driver.
SPECIALLY MATERIAL: Durable chrome vanadium steel material, the hardness can reach 56HRC. We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly, Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!
GIFTS FOR MEN who have everything, a perfect gift for Father’s day/Mother’s day/Birthday/Valentines Day/Christmas/Anniversary /Halloween/Thanksgiving gifts etc. fathers day gifts for dad/grandpa/stepdad/hushand/brother from wife/daughter/son/girlfriend/kids. You won’t know you need universal socket until you have one! Make it yours now and make your life more easier.
UNCOMPROMISING CUSTOMER CARE: Any question, please feel free to contact us through Amazon,We will save your problem within 24 hours.We’d love to make you a perfect purchase experience!
